projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of my recent work showcasing my skills in web development and design.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a software developer based in London and relocating to Japan in September 2025. Life as a dev began in the midst of the pandemic when we were homebound. I decided to give the infamous CS50 course a go. Why not? A few online courses later, the only thing I was certain of was that I absolutely loved it. Closures? Not a clue. I threw myself into and embarked on a full-time diploma and built some cool stuff and met some cool people. I found myself working for a creative agency where my code became prettier and produced prettier looking thingsâ€¦
about.paragraph2: I'm extremely passionate about biodiversity and the environment and love to travel. I lived in Tokyo and Fukuoka for a few years from where a lot of my inspiration is now derived. I love gaming, snowboarding, coffee and movies (and ranking them). But spending time with my son makes all of that pale in comparison.
about.paragraph3: I work with React most of the time but I'm always looking at ways to make code cleaner, faster and more efficient. I've produced work for companies such as Sony, Lenovo, Hitachi and Juniper ranging from landing pages to full-blown full-stack applications. I've built Express APIs and worked with Symfony. I've also built smaller apps and games in Svelte and Three.js.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision. Feel free to contact me using the form below.

contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.thankYou: I've got your message! I'll get back to you as soon as I can. . . :)
